Introduction

This App helps to collect anonymously a measure of mood/happiness and the reasons for unhappiness among employees. The data provides a bird-eye view so that the leadership team could reflect on its own performance but also assist the teams in trouble by various means.

Feel free to learn more about the App here or how it makes the data collection anonymous here.
